subject: Re: Faraday Cage

full_text:

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@...> wrote:
>
> 
> I just had a thought go thru my head ( Oh shit ).What would happen if you put a voice recorder in a
> Faraday Cage, and have a session with a ghost box.... The Faraday Cage isn't supposed to pick up radio
> interference right ? Would it pick up the other voices or not ? I know the entities are talking thru the radio
> but has anyone ever tried it ? Stupid question huh ?????
>
